titles.title: To designate the Federal building located at 228 Walnut Street, in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, as the "Ronald Reagan Federal Building".
To designate the Federal building located at 228 Walnut Street, in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, as the "Ronald Reagan Federal Building".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: Designates the Federal building located at 228 Walnut Street, Harrisburg, Pennsylvania, as the Ronald Reagan Federal Building.
